knowledge.title: Title
knowledge.addNewEntryDesc: Add a new entry to the knowledge base
knowledge.noEntriesEmpty: Add your first entry or use the Site Scraper to import content
knowledge.askQuestion: Ask a question to test your knowledge base...
knowledge.noMatches: No matching entries found. The AI provided a general response.
knowledge.reindexDesc: This will regenerate embeddings for all entries. This may take a while depending on the number of entries and your embedding provider.
knowledge.deleteEntryDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.
knowledge.embeddingRequiredDesc: Knowledge base requires embeddings. Select an embedding provider: Local AI (free & private) or OpenAI, then re-index the knowledge base.
knowledge.embeddingNotConfigured: Please configure an embedding provider first. Enable Local AI (free & private) or OpenAI in the AI settings, then try again.

siteScraper.enterUrlsDesc: Add URLs from your website or help centre to import (FAQ, amenities, policies, etc.)
siteScraper.extractingContent: Analyzing website content and extracting knowledge entries
siteScraper.generatingQuestions: Creating guest questions from extracted content
siteScraper.noQuestionsGenerated: No questions generated for this entry
siteScraper.entriesFound: {{count}} entries found. Select which ones to import.
siteScraper.savingToKnowledge: Saving to knowledge base and generating embeddings
siteScraper.importedEntries: Successfully imported {{count}} entries to your knowledge base.
siteScraper.embeddingRequiredDesc: Set up embeddings to save scraped content to your knowledge base. Use Local AI (free & private) or OpenAI for faster performance.
siteScraper.noContentFound: No content found on the provided URLs
